summary:
The Security Council,
Reaffirming previous resolutions on the situation, 
Reiterating Israel's obligation to abide by the Fourth Geneva Convention,
Calls on Israel to address security needs within international law boundaries,
Expressing grave concern at the situation's deterioration,
Condemning killing of Palestinian civilians and home demolitions in Rafah,
Recalling Road Map obligations,
Condemning violence, terror and destruction,
Reaffirming support for the Road Map,
1. Calls on Israel to respect international humanitarian law, particularly on home demolitions;
2. Expresses concern on the humanitarian situation in Rafah and calls for emergency assistance;
3. Calls for cessation of violence and respect for legal obligations;
4. Calls on both parties to implement Road Map obligations;
5. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
